column4: BRIEF-Bladex Announces $14.5 Million Profit For The First Quarter 2018, Or $0.37 Per Share
column5: April 20 (Reuters) - Banco Latinoamericano de Comercio Exterior SA:
column6: * BLADEX ANNOUNCES $14.5 MILLION PROFIT FOR THE FIRST QUARTER 2018, OR $0.37 PER SHARE
column7: * SETS QUARTERLY DIVIDEND OF $0.385PER SHARE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
